snippet: Evan Dietrich-Smith returned to Green Bay in December 2010, only to be inactive during the Packers’ Super Bowl run. Now he is a key piece to their championship hopes this winter.
abstract: Green Bay Packers center Evan Dietrich-Smith, who took over for veteran center Jeff Saturday in Week 16, has become a key component of the team's Super Bowl hopes; Dietrich-Smith is preparing with team for upcoming playoff game against Minnesota Vikings.
lead_paragraph: Evan Dietrich-Smith returned to Green Bay in December 2010, only to be inactive during the Packers’ Super Bowl run. Now he is a key piece to their championship hopes this winter.

headline.seo: For Center Evan Dietrich-Smith and Packers, a Second Chance Is Paying Off
headline.main: Second Chance Is Paying Off for Packers and Their Center
headline.print_headline: Second Chance Is Paying Off for Packers and Their Center
